definition: a bright idea suddenly occurs (idiom); to hit upon an inspiration/to be struck by a brainwave
quick/alert/efficacious/effective/to come true/spirit/departed soul/coffin
machine/engine/opportunity/intention/aircraft/pivot/crucial point/flexible (quick-witted)/organic/CL:臺|台[tai2]
surname Ji
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: One day, while sitting outside in his lawn chair, Larry had his eureka moment.
sentences.chinese: 一天，当拉里坐在屋外的折椅上时，突然灵机一动。

sentences.english: Thensuddenly, an idea came into her racing, terrified brain.
sentences.chinese: 后来她灵机一动，恐惧的大脑想出一个主意。

sentences.english: Why dont she a brainwave, through right rare to du from far away.
sentences.chinese: 她灵机一动，何不通过右少见到杜自远。

sentences.english: He got an idea. He removed the map, and then patiently tore it up into small pieces.
sentences.chinese: 他灵机一动，把地图撕下来，耐心地撕成小块。

sentences.english: His inspiration, come up with a "imitative" strategy.
sentences.chinese: 东方朔灵机一动，想出一个“照方抓药”的计谋。

sentences.english: At this dark and hopeless moment an inspiration burst upon him!
sentences.chinese: 正在这灰心绝望的时刻，他忽然灵机一动，计上心来。

definition: quick witted in an emergency/able to react resourcefully
suddenly have a thought (idiom)/suddenly be inspired to do something
to figure out/to work out (a solution etc)/to think up/to come up with (an idea etc)
inspiration in a moment of desperation (idiom)/also written 情急之下
to be just about to/to be on the point of
to hurry/to hasten/to make haste
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
hastily
to consider/to ponder
in a great rush/in a flurry
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
way/method/Taiwan pr. [fa2 zi5]
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
excellent plan/brilliant scheme
promptly/at once
